sentences: Lisa Komine (コミネリサ, Komine Risa, alt. 小峰理紗), (born July 3 ), stylized lisa, is a Japanese singer-songwriter.
She is known for her songs that were featured in several broadcast anime shows.
She is signed under the Flying Dog label.
Some of the anime shows include: Gosick, Psychic Detective Yakumo, Linebarrels of Iron, Melody of Oblivion, Mobile Suit Gundam SEED, Rental Magica, and Ristorante Paradiso.
